tsdst.distributions.exponential_mle¶

tsdst.distributions.exponential_mle(data, censored)[source]¶

Maximum Likelihood Estimate of an exponential distribution (with an option for right-censoring).

Parameters
datanumpy array

The data for the exponential distribution (usually time between events, or similar).

censorednumpy array

An array of boolean values where 1 means the event occured and 0 means the event is censored (right).

Returns
list

A list containing (in order) the MLE, the standard error, and the 95% confidence interval for the estimate.
